name: Death Game+
description: It's a race to your grave! Can you die before everyone else, or will you be forced to watch in despair, living to a ripe old age before finally succumbing to a regular, uninteresting ending?!!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista SP1+, Mac OS X 10.9+, Ubuntu 12.04+, SteamOS+. Processor: CPU: SSE2 instruction set support. (So pretty much anything in the last 10 years) Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities. DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: Game size is dependant on platform
